content: this pattern is very simple and easy to follow i would say anyone with basic understanding of crochet stitches could follow this please enjoy my pattern/tutorial for this fun garland i m so happy to share this http //beccadoodle blogspot com/2013/03/crochet-spring-flower-garland-pattern html 1 1 http //beccadoodle blogspot com/2013/03/crochet-spring-flower-garland-pattern html yay
